original_text: That is why the Levites did not receive any land for themselves, as the other tribes did. The Lord himself would give them everything that they needed, as he had promised.)
korean_text: 그러므로 레위는 그의 형제 중에 분깃이 없으며 기업이 없고 네 하나님 여호와께서 그에게 말씀하심 같이 여호와가 그의 기업이시니라)

sentences.original_text: That is why the Levites did not receive any land
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 레위족속이 땅을 받지 못한 이유입니다

sentences.original_text: The Lord himself would give them
